thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Awarded EPC Contract With Nova Chemicals

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Awarded EPC Contract With Nova Chemicals
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - SNC-Lavalin Group Inc:
* SNC-LAVALIN AWARDED EPC CONTRACT WITH NOVA CHEMICALS
* SNC-LAVALIN - IN CONSORTIUM WITH TECHNIPFMC, CO AWARDED LUMP SUM EPC CONTRACT TO SUPPLY NOVA CHEMICALS WITH TWO GAS CRACKING FURNACES
* SNC-LAVALIN GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT, TECHNIPFMC WILL HAVE PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITY FOR DETAILED ENGINEERING AND PROCUREMENT ASPECTS OF WORK
* SNC-LAVALIN GROUP INC - UNDER AGREEMENT, SNC-LAVALIN WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR MODULAR FABRICATION, ERECTION, CONSTRUCTION AND PRE-COMMISSIONING OF WORK. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
